short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension shows percentile for IMDb ratings

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Have you ever been wondering why TV series on IMDb has higher ratings than movies?

Do you want to know how good is 6.0 star movie really? Well, not so good - it is only better than 36% of other movies.

Do you know how good is 6.0 star TV series? Even worse - it is just 20%.

Do you know that 7.5 start TV series is good Sci-fi but not so good Drama?

IMDB Percentile extension allows you to find out how good the movie or TV series is (in general or with-in a genre)
